short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL Replace Pro Max Plus is the extension to replace the URL based on rules.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Install extension.
2. Pin extension in the toolbar for easy access.
3. On the tool bar icon, right-click and select Options to define search/replace rules and save.
4. Visit a site matching the defined search rules.
5. Notice the URL being replaced as defined by rules.
6. No information is collected or transferred.

If it is useful and you like it, please rate.
